name: pear-dark-syntaxx
description: A dark syntax theme based on pear-syntax.
readme: # pear-dark-syntax Fresh and juicy pear, dazzling sunlight, and blue sky. The light version is [here](https://atom.io/themes/pear-syntax) ![Sample](http://i.imgur.com/oxE0JpV.png) > The font used in this screenshot is [DejaVu sans mono](http://dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/Main_Page). ## HTML ![html](http://i.imgur.com/ncVUhdY.png) ## less ![less](http://i.imgur.com/7wNjsX2.png) ## JavaScript ![javascript](http://i.imgur.com/oIP1KNS.png) > The font used in these screenshots is [Hack](http://sourcefoundry.org/hack/).
